meta.name: 紳士大哥
meta.about: A writer, a producer, and a Hongkonger.

meta.name: Fresh TV
meta.about:
We are a group of Hong Kong people living in Europe. No matter where we are, we want to present the beauty of the world in our most cherished language. We have no sponsor or special background, we just created this TV station with passion, and will use the greatest effort to produce various programs.
If you also love Hong Kong, if you also love Cantonese, I hope you can support us.

Lastly, what do we call Fresh TV?
Because we are fresh, we are new. We might look a little dumb, but we are also sweet.

我們是一班旅居在歐的香港人，無論身處何方都想以自己最珍惜的語言，去把世界的美麗呈現。我們沒有金主也沒有特別背景，只是滿懷熱血地創造了這個電視台，並將以最微小的力量匯聚，製作各個以廣東話為本的節目。
如果你也愛香港，如果你也愛廣東話，希望你們可以給予支持。

最後，點解我們叫蕃薯？
因為，香港人叫蕃薯做蕃薯，普通話同國語都唔係，所以，蕃薯係我地頻道既名稱。
而且，我地人在外地只係small potatoes, we are little dumb, and we are little sweet.
仲有，我地黃皮黃心黃過金。

meta.name: 蕃薯電視台
meta.about: 我們是一班旅居在歐的香港人，無論身處何方都想以自己最珍惜的語言，去?
